attributes.action: ensure that all those arrested for cultivation of cannabis get custodial sentences
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Far too many times do those caught cultivating cannabis get let off with police cautions, (sometimes authorised by the CPS). It is about time cannabis growers realised they will get a prison sentence if caught and not get let off "because it's their first offence".
We call for a change in the law so that first time offenders get prosecuted to the fullest extent, after all cannabis possession is an offence.
